bug.short_desc: Arbitrary code execution due to insecure loading of Python module(s) from CWD
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
The pyinotify utility from the python-inotify package tries to load the "pyinotify" Python module from the current working directory (CWD).
$ cat /usr/bin/pyinotify #! /bin/bash #
python -m pyinotify "$@"
Steps to Reproduce:
$ cat > pyinotify.py print("boom!")
$ pyinotify # invoke /usr/bin/pyinotify script boom!
Additional info:
This bug is very similar to https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=995060
python3-inotify package is similarly affected.
